fields.article_name: Wine Tasting Terms - All You Need To Know
fields.context: Wine tasting, like many other subjects, has its own vocabulary. On your next visit to wine country, why not ask for a chance to taste wine straight from the barrel? Though the tasting will be unlike anything you experience from a bottle, it will be fun and memorable. And members, remember your member benefit: Let us know when you are traveling to wine country so we can arrange a VIP Tasting for you.
